p: Next, we analyzed the importance of the DRs in the context of CHIKV-LR, deleting the two copies of DR1 and the two copies of DR2. In accordance with our previous results and with the observations by Morley et al. [ 22], the deletion caused a dramatic delay on viral replication in C6/36 cells, while it did not affect replication in BHK cells ( Fig 5B).
